name: Red Skater
description:
Run and jump through 16 incredible levels avoiding obstacles, tramps and evil skaters that will block you until you arrive to the finish line.

Go all over the most amazing sceneries: buildings in the city, skate parks, constructions and a nuclear power plant.

Find more by Tangled Games here: http://www.tangledgames.net

Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/tangledgames
